content.html: I want a world where people can be super successful in their careers without over working, without gritting my teeth through unethical, miserable jobs, without doing a ton of open source But that doesn’t reflect the reality of my career. So how can I mentor someone to do better
content.value:
I want a world where people can be super successful in their careers without over working, without gritting my teeth through  unethical, miserable jobs, without doing a ton of open source

But that doesn’t reflect the reality of my career. So how can I mentor someone to do better
